It's the story of a user named Omer Barnir who reported a bug in 2005 on the MySQL bug report platform

But the thing is that Omer never got an answer. 15 years later, the bug has never been fix and people are starting to make fun out of it. We let you take a look at the conversation here, it's pretty funny
